alert.note: Alert for Las Vegas Valley; Southern Clark County; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon; Western Clark and Southern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued May 08 at 12:11AM PDT until May 08 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 11 PM PDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected Sunday. * WHERE...Southern Nye County and much of central and western Clark County. This includes the Las Vegas Valley, Spring Mountains, and Pahrump. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 11 PM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Areas of blowing dust are likely. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds are expected across the Spring Mountains and far western Las Vegas Valley, with gusts over 60 mph most likely near Summerlin, Mountains Edge, Centennial Hills, and Red Rock Canyon.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other lightweight fixtures and unsecured outdoor objects. Operators of motorcycles, vans, campers, trailers, and other high profile vehicles should be especially cautious for the possibility of sudden, strong crosswinds and be prepared for areas of blowing dust which could drastically reduce visibility.

area.areaDesc: Las Vegas Valley; Southern Clark County; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon; Western Clark and Southern Nye County
